translation.name: Name
translation.title: Title
translation.GraduationTCC: Customer relationship management system (CRM) developed for the Graduation's Final Paper.
translation.PostGraduationTCC: Projects, people and tasks management system (Kanban) developed for the Post-Graduation's Final Paper.
translation.CourseGalery: Pictures Galery project developed with the course of programming Fullstack Angular & Node.
translation.CourseCosts: Costs project developed with the course of React made by a channel on Youtube.
translation.CourseRocketBox: RocketBox project developed with the course of React made by RocketSeat.
translation.CourseRocketHelp: RocketHelp project developed with the course of React Native made by RocketSeat.
translation.Portfolio: Portfolio developed by Victor Hanszman to show the projects and technologies.
translation.PokedexLaravel: Pokédex developed consuming the Pokémon data API using Laravel and Bootstrap to study the technologies.
translation.PokedexAngular: Pokédex developed consuming the Pokémon data API using Angular to study the technology.
translation.BattleOfMonsters: Battle Of Monsters project developed to practice Angular.
translation.StefaniniFord: Vehicle maintenance service scheduling systems for Ford car manufacturer from countries: Thailand, Vietnam and Philippines, which I work mostly as a Front-End Developer
translation.StefaniniAle: Control system for exchanging points for rewards for the Ale gas station.
translation.M2MLecto: Electrical energy control and measurement system for companies in this field.
translation.4MTICotz: Enterprise resource planning (ERP) system for self-control of the company itself and for a law firm.
translation.4MTIDP: System of grouping and analysis of bids and public documents.
translation.4MTIMapaEspecialistas: Mapping system of medical specialties for the medicine sector (NESCON) of the UFMG college.
translation.4MTIAdunaLins: Control systems of public documents, expenses and bids for the Public Ministry of the state of Minas Gerais (MPMG), which I worked as a User Tester and Project manager
translation.IntroText: I am a Full Stack Web Developer, working on Front-End and Back-End. I live in the metropolitan region of Belo Horizonte in the state of Minas Gerais in Brazil. Currently I'm working remotely and looking for some new home office opportunities. I wish to continue growing and gaining professional experience in the field of Software Development.
